EXP-4-0020-06.scenario_description: Create an expense report for the same worker that was used above for Personal charge.  Expense report should be for out of pocket expense to be reimbursed to Expense payee and total must be for an amount greater than  the personal charge in previous report

steps.sub_task: Ensure that the total of this expense reports exceeds the amount of personal charges from the previous report
steps.expected_result: The amount to reimburse to worker is the net of any amount due for personal charges

EXP-4-0020-09.scenario_name: Expense Report - Personal Credit Card Transaction to Recoupment (Recoup from a subsequent Expense Report)
EXP-4-0020-09.scenario_description: Verify Expense Report is no longer on "Negative Reimbursable Expense Reports with Outstanding Balances

steps.task: 9. Find Negative Reimbursable Expense Reports with Outstanding Balance
steps.sub_task: Verify Expense Report is no longer on "Negative Reimbursable Expense Reports with Outstanding Balances or that the amount was reduced correctly
steps.expected_result: The reimbursable portion of the second expense report will reduce the amount on the "Negative Reimbursable Expense Report with Outstanding Balance." If the outstanding balance is paid in full the worker will no longer appear on the report "Negative Reimbursable Expense Reports with Outstanding Balance".

Verify Instructional Text Verify Expense Item Attribute setup for each Expense Item, if applicable verify rate table attached and itemization configured .

steps.sub_task: Verify list of Expense Items for completeness. Verify that correct Spend Category has been loaded for each Expense Item. Verify that correct Expense Item Group(s) has been loaded for each Expense Item. Verify Expense Processing (Maximum Expense, Allow Overage, Fixed Expense, Quantity and Per Unit Amount Not Enterable). Verify Instructional Text Verify Expense Item Attribute setup for each Expense Item

EXP-5-0100.scenario_description: Verify list of Airlines, Alternate Names

EXP-5-0110.scenario_description: Verify list of Hotels, Alternate Names

EXP-5-0120.scenario_description: Verify list of Rental Car Agencies, Alternate Names

EXP-5-0130.scenario_description: Verify that the correct default accounts have been defined where applicable for Expenses: Credit Card Payable, Expense Advance, Expenses Payable, Expense Payable to Supplier, Expense Payee Receivable and Spend Categories in the Spend rule. Note that the Spend rule is shared with Supplier spend.

EXP-5-0140.scenario_description: Verify all required Custom Validations have been configured for:  Expense Reports, Payment Election Enrollment, Spend Authorization

EXP-5-0150.scenario_description: Verify all required Worktag Usages have been configured for:  Expense Reports, Corporate Credit Card Account, and Spend Authorization

EXP-5-0160.scenario_description: Confirm that the Assignable Roles for Expenses have been properly assigned or are defaulting to each Company:  Expense Advance Repayment Specialist, Expense Analyst, Expense Data Entry Specialist, Expense Operations Lead, Expense Partner, Expense Settlement Specialist

EXP-5-0170.scenario_description: Review tax codes to verify required codes configured

EXP-5-0180.scenario_description: Review BP for correct approval routing for Expense Reports. If in scope verify the BP Spend Authorization

steps.task: Business Process : Expense Report Event, Business Process : Spend Authorization
